title: Trumans use of the atomic bomb - reason

content.question: Which of the following was Harry Truman’s stated reason for authorizing the use of the atomic bomb against Japan?

choices.label: Using the atomic bomb would prevent the need for a costly invasion of Japan.
Dropping the atomic bomb would demonstrate United States military capability to the Soviets.
An earlier United States land assault against Japan had been unsuccessful.
The development of the atomic bomb had been expensive.
The United States should retaliate in response to Japan’s attack on Pearl Harbor.

content.answer: Using the atomic bomb would prevent the need for a costly invasion of Japan.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
